meta.description: Maximize profit from selling products A, B, and byproduct C considering production and disposal constraints.

params.name: front_process_time
params.description: Time required for the front process for each product.

params.name: back_process_time
params.description: Time required for the back process for each product.

params.name: front_process_capacity
params.description: Total available hours for the front process.

params.name: back_process_capacity
params.description: Total available hours for the back process.

params.name: profit
params.description: Profit from selling one unit of each product.

params.name: byproduct_profit
params.description: Profit from selling one unit of byproduct C.

params.name: disposal_cost
params.description: Cost of disposing one unit of byproduct C.

params.name: max_byproduct_sales
params.description: Maximum units of byproduct C that can be sold.

vars.name: x
vars.description: Number of units produced for each product.

vars.name: y
vars.description: Number of units of byproduct C sold.

objective.name: max_total_profit
objective.expr: profit['A'] * x['A'] + profit['B'] * x['B'] + byproduct_profit * y - disposal_cost * (2 * x['B'] - y)
objective.description: Maximize total profit from selling products A, B, and byproduct C, considering disposal costs.

constraints.name: front_process_capacity_constraint
constraints.description: Total time used in the front process must not exceed available capacity.

constraints.name: back_process_capacity_constraint
constraints.description: Total time used in the back process must not exceed available capacity.

constraints.name: byproduct_sales_limit
constraints.description: Units of byproduct C sold must not exceed the maximum sales limit.

constraints.name: byproduct_production_constraint
constraints.description: Units of byproduct C sold must not exceed the amount produced.
